messages.title: On the doorstep
messages.content: Public services - I'm a former teacher, worked in the NHS for over 35 years and my Mum was a car worker. I know what it's like on the front line on our public services too! I'll never sit back while the Tories flog off our public services. They're too important.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We're leaving the EU. That's decided. Now we need a Brexit that works for Barnsley and for Britain. I'll fight for a Brexit that puts people and public services first.

As a former teacher and someone whose family has close ties to the NHS, I know the importance of protecting our public services. I'll never sit back while the Tories privatize our critical public resources.
We need more police on our streets and a zero tolerance approach to things like fly-tipping. Labour will fund 10,000 new police officers.
We need new controls on immigration. As we leave the EU, it's critical to manage immigration and stop big employers using migrant workers to drive down pay, conditions and job security.
Labour will invest in specific projects to stop employers exploiting the unemployed.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit: we're leaving the EU. Now we need a Brexit that works for Barnsley and for Britain.
issues.education: As a former teacher, I understand the importance of investing in our education system.
issues.health: Public services - I'm a former teacher, worked in the NHS for over 35 years and my Mum was a car worker...
issues.immigration: We need new controls on immigration. As we leave the EU, that's got to be a priority and we must stop big employers using migrant workers to drive down pay, conditions and job security.
issues.labourEmployment: Labour will invest in specific projects to stop employers exploiting the unemployed.
issues.lawCrime: We need more police on our streets and a zero tolerance approach to things like fly-tipping. Labour will fund 10,000 new police officers.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked on the front line of public services.

contactInformation.address: 42, Mappin House, Dunfields Quarter, Barnsley, S70 1NY

quotes.text: Once elected, I will continue to be a strong voice in Parliament for Barnsley East.

images.caption: None of your pledges are for Westminister or anywhere else, they are for Barnsley East
A good day's pay for a good day's work
Defending our NHS & Tackling the care crisis
Helping our young people get on in life

examples: Labour will fund 10,000 new police officers.
